item.title: Desert Hawk Gold Corp 10-K
item.description: Desert Hawk Gold Corp, which is in the Gold & Silver Ores [1040] industry, SEC 10-K filing on April 19, 2021 had 21345 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 372 instances 000 - 233 instances gold - 201 instances mining - 184 instances agreement - 180 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
